subSubSection.paragraph: This taxon is identical to Carassius buergeri subsp. 2 of Hosoya (2013) . Hosoya (2002) treated this species as a subspecies of C. auratus based on genetics, ecological features and comparison with the types in RMNH (but this work is still under preparation). This taxon was mostly collected from lentic environments, but occasionally from lotic environments.
